review: What a doctor she is !!! So friendly, caring and guided us throughout our journey. Fortunate to have come across a doctor like her. Please don’t hesitate to consult Chandana mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Scan,Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Ectopic Pregnancy Surgery,
review:
Rating:(5/5 stars)

I recently had the pleasure of being under the care of Dr.Chandana Mam, and my experience was nothing short of exceptional.

Ectopic Surgery:
Coming to my story I had ectopic pregnancy in 2022 and the previous doctor(don't want to mention the name) didn't diagnose properly but Dr Chandana Mam was the 1st
person to properly diagnose and performed a successful ectopic surgery in 2022, showcasing not only her expertise but also a genuine concern for my well-being. 
She thoroughly  explained the case to us and made sure that we understand the cruciality of the situation and the procedure was carried out with precision, 
and I felt reassured at every step.

Prenatal Care:

Next thing is I conceived naturally in 2023 even after Ectopic and again we had been with Dr Chandana Mam for my prenatal care, All medications and diagnosis were given and done on time
She always goes above and beyond to address my concerns and keep me informed.Her approachability made each visit comfortable, fostering a sense of trust and collaboration.

C-Section Surgery:

Finally comes the Surgery,as we approached the delivery date, the discussion around a C-section was handled with care and transparency.
Dr.Chandana Mam's patience and accessibility made the decision-making process easier, and the actual surgery was conducted with utmost professionalism and care
considering my previous history and as my case is under High-Risk, Dr.Chandana Mam's approach to diagnosis and treatment was nothing short of top-notch and her
ability to navigate and manage high-risk situations with skill and precision was evident throughout the entire process,
providing me with a sense of confidence and security.

Postnatal Care:

Dr. Chandana Mam even continued to impress with postnatal care as well
The availability and approachability extended beyond the clinic, with the doctor being easily reachable over the phone during any time of the day.
This level of commitment to patient support truly sets her apart.

Overall Impression:

In addition to Her medical expertise, Dr.Chandana Mam stands out for her genuine care and accessibility.
Mam's patience and approachability, both in-person and over the phone, made me feel well-supported throughout the entire journey.
I highly recommend Dr. Chandana Mam to anyone seeking not only a skilled gynecologist but also a caring and accessible healthcare partner.

I am truly grateful for the exceptional care I received.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have visited for my pregnancy checkup starting from 5th month, I was very happy with Dr. Chandana as she  listens all our concerns and queries very attentively and give her response with smile and patience. I was very much satisfied with her through out my pregnancy journey to till emergency C - session. She makes us understand the situation and takes right decisions at correct time. I would highly recommend to all as she takes care and explains all of our concerns and gives us positive vibe in the journey of pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
We went to see Dr. Chandana for a general check-up and ended up talking about the second pregnancy. We were hesitant and scared to get pregnant again after a traumatic ectopic pregnancy, and when we discussed it with her, she was very polite and assured us to take a step forward. Our journey with Doctor began then and there, and there hasn't been a single day since that I haven't thanked her:).

She was always available and there for us, regardless of her busy schedule, and she is very patient in listening to all of our concerns and questions. She treats her patients like family and goes above and beyond to assist them.

 I successfully conceived without any medication or any treatment  and had a happy pregnancy until 7th month but then unfortunately went into labour at 31 weeks for unknown reasons ( had my baby#1 till full term) and was also hit by Covid at the same time, leaving me unsure what to do, but Dr. Chandana, despite her health condition, reassured me and arrived at the hospital within minutes, standing by my side throughout my delivery and ensuring I was all in good health until the baby was delivered. She also assisted us in having the baby via VBAC, which I had never imagined or dreamed of. She was always a phone call away from the start, until I recovered from my pregnancy, and even now!

A doctor like Dr. Chandana is extremely rare and difficult to come by, and she is a true treasure. Thank you, Doctor, for your devotion and assistance during this journey; we will be eternally grateful!! I wish you the best of luck!!
reply_text: Appreciate your feedback very much Chinmayi. Thank you for the trust you placed on us and for remaining calm throughout your emergency which helped you come out in flying colors. We wish you happy times with your little one!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Initially, we visited Dr. Chandana for my PCOS related issues and as we were trying to conceive since some time. Prior to that, it was a very critical time for us as all known sources indicate conception in PCOS becomes difficult.Dr Chandana was very supportive, and assuring at all times that all will go well.Amidst that I had also suffered from covid and post covid symptoms. However, Dr. Chandana always found time to reassure us and build our confidence that there isn't anything to worry about.She is very knowledgeable and experienced and her diagnosis and treatments worked like a charm.She is always very approachable, friendly and cordial throughout the entire process; always looking out to ease the tension and worries of her patients. Within a few months of being consulting with her, we were able to conceive.Dr. Chandana Ma'am has been very helpful throughout the pregnancy process with the regular health checkups and for any sort of issues; she always makes her best efforts to ooze away the anxieties; most importantly, she always makes herself available for her patients. Moreover, she will always patiently listen to whatever doubt or queries we have and resolves everything that we have in our mind.At her clinic, we never have to wait for more than 10-15 minutes to visit her; besides, the staff there is also very friendly, cooperative and provide a personalized experience.Now we have been blessed with our new born just some time back. The delivery was also performed by Dr. Chandana and her team at Rainbow Hospital, where she is a visiting consultant.In my case it had to be a C-section due to stature related medical reasons, or else Dr. Chandana Ma'am wanted to take the normal delivery approach; I was very worried initially about how things would fare. However, with Dr. Chandana at our side, we were rest assured that things will go well and they did !We have been very lucky to have been under Dr. Chandana's guidance and consultation at Satyasree clinics.She is my dedicated gynaecologist and for anyone looking for a trusted gynaecologist, I recommend Dr. Chandana wholeheartedly.P.S. \" Thank you Ma'am for always being there for us and not just as a doctor, but as a friend and a guide; we are both highly grateful to you. Wish you the very best always. \
reply_text: Overwhelmed with your feedback Meenakshi. Thank you for taking the time to write every step of your journey with us. This has reinforced our commitment to take care of women's health. Wish you happy motherhood and healthy times ahead.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My journey with Dr Chandana started when my mother started having menopausal issues & was suggested Hysterectomy. I was referred to Dr Chandana from my office colleague  here in New Jersey. We had a video consultation initially , she was one most caring Doctors, listened patiently to all my queries & addressed each of them. Her calm assuring presence is what my mom liked the most & she decided to get the surgery done in Rainbow hospital.  With travel restrictions in place in 2021, I couldn't come down to India, but the detailed plan she wrote to me gave me enough peace to stay back & let my mom go through surgery.
My personal interaction with Dr Chandana a couple of years later was for my very own 2nd child planning after we moved back to Hyderabad. She gave me a real insight into my issues and made me understand that these issues are common and can be treated. She gave us that confidence to plan for our 2nd child as I was above 36yrs.
Being a Gold medallist in her subject from one of the top university in India really shows in the quality of care I got. It's not about peppy talk but it's the knowledge & the skill she shows is what impressed me & my husband alike.
We have another 3 months to go for the child to come but I can heap a ton of praises for this wonderful doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Visited for pregnancy check up and hospitality 
Highly recommend to visit Dr. Chandana mam, I was pregnant with my 1st pregnancy on my 4th month pregnancy I was visited to mam because I was affected with some allergies then after that I was continuing my pregnancy check with mam . Later on we found very comfortable with her approach and treatment care though out my pregnancy journey. I was  gastrointestinal diabetic in my throughout pregnancy but mam gives me good care and treatment for his suggestions it went well very smoothly.she is always open and gives her best time to listen to each every patient with care. The best part is she was also pregnant at my time and she had delivery one month before my delivery date and she was busy with his newborn baby boy and she was on leave but she was connected with me throughout the phone and she came to the hospital for my delivery.. The whole rainbow team and with doctor made my day special with their care. Especially thanks to Dr.chandana mam for the timely empathy and encouragement shown during the last stage of my pregnancy and successfully  delivery my baby boy. Best wishes to you doctors more successful in your careerer. Thank you so much
reply_text: Thank you for the wonderful words and the affection showered. Thanks for the belief in us. Wish you lovely times ahead with your little one!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
When I was pregnant with my second baby, We visited initially Chandana madam due to the clinic's vicinity from our home. Later on we found very comfortable with her approach and treatment with care throughout my pregnancy journey.
As everyone said here, she is always open and gives her best time to listen to each and every patient with care. This sometimes, creates more waiting time at the clinic. But, the moment your turn comes, the amount of quality time given by the physician is what comes to your mind and makes you more confident and happy.

Since my first pregnancy was a normal. She was also particular that we will try for normal. And after 16 hours of labour, on 22nd April, my second little one came out through induced vaginal delivery.
The whole rainbow team along with doctor made my day big with their care . Especially am thankful to you doctor, for the timely emphathy and encouragement shown during the last stage of my labour in successfully delivering my baby. 

Best wishes to you doctor for more successful deliveries and to continue the care with your usual poise.
reply_text: Thank you Saraswathi for the detailed heartfelt feedback. Wish u happy motherhood!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I delivered a girl baby in September 2021. She is my first child and precious child too. I started consulting Dr. Chandana from my 4th month of pregnancy.. Before that i got infected with covid in beginning of 4th month of pregnancy and suffered a lot. Dr. Chandana was very supportive, down to earth, and helped a lot in post covid recovery. She was able to assess my conditions perfectly and decide on my treatment including mode of delivery. She was very professional and always available on the fixed appointment time and date. I never waited more than 30 minutes for my consultation during my entire pregnancy check up at her clinic. During my delivery and post delivery period also she made sure that everything happens as planned and hassle free and my family members also grew fond of her.  She is available after 5.30pm on Monday to Saturday and from 11am on Sundays in her clinic, which is another favorable condition for working women like me. Her clinic is in very much accessible area and her staffs are very polite and cooperative too. Dr. Chandana is my trusted Gynecologist and if anyone is looking for a good Gynecologist,  I recommend her whole heartedly.
reply_text: Pleased to know you are happy with our care. A huge thanks for taking the time for a detailed feedback. Appreciate it very much!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My friend recommended to consult Dr. Chandana when we were actively trying to conceive. We got pregnant the first month of consultation itself.Dr. Chandana is very patient in explaining all the medical terms during monthly checkups.I was diagnosed with Pre-eclampsia in week 33 which is considered as high risk pregnancy and the risk is for both me and the baby. I am thankful to her for timely diagnosis and the treatment. I had planned C Section as soon as I entered 37 weeks as per her recommendation. She was very supportive during those last few weeks, she responds timely on calls and WhatsApp for any queries. Then immense medical and moral support she gave me inside Operation theater was unforgettable. Today 10 weeks postpartum, I still consult her and take her advise. Today me, my baby and my family are grateful to found her. I highly recommend her and she is the one for those who want to have their OBGs explain them the medical terms, have their worries cleared instead of simply writing prescriptions..Lastly Satyasree clinic is well maintained clinic with good response from staff for appointments and followups. Good support with diagnostic center.
What a doctor she is !!! So friendly, caring and guided us throughout our journey. Fortunate to have come across a doctor like her. Please don’t hesitate to consult Chandana mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
we have visited many Gynaecologists in Bangalore for about 6 years without any success.
After we moved to Hyderabad we consulted Dr Chandana in SatyaSree Clinics Kondapur.
She is very humble and cleared all out doubts.
It was Happy, healthy & joyful Journey of us & baby after we started consulting Dr Chandana,
We had blessed with HEALTHY  BABY BOY (by C-section) on 5th-July-2023 at Ankura Hospital Madhinaguda .
we are thankful Dr. Chandana & entire pediatric Team of Satya Sri clinics had taken care without any flaws,
We would strongly recommend Dr Chandana  for any obstetrics and gynecology related issues (from Infertility to HIGH RISK PREGENANCY (especially))

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Dr Chandana is a great doctor who helped me through my first pregnancy. She was very attentive and responsive to my needs and concerns. She always consulted me with respect and honesty. When I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes, she helped me to manage my condition and keep my baby healthy. 

She was very approachable and friendly throughout the pregnancy. She always greeted me with a smile and a warm welcome. She was very supportive and reassuring during the delivery. She delivered my baby girl without any hassle. I am so glad to have her as my doctor.
*** ** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Chandana is a new generation OB/GYN with good credentials. Non judgemental and friendly. She spends time with patients and explains everything with patience. She has been a pillar of support throughout my pregnancy. All her suggestions worked well for me, Definitely recommended!
Dr. Chandana is amazing welcomes her patients with smile, visited her for pregnancy checkup in my 12th week and she answered all my queries without any hesitation. I appreciate her patience. Thankyou

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am very thankful to Dr. Chandana ma'am for making my pregnancy journey safe & smooth. Though there were some ups and downs during the pregnancy but ma'am always there for me and had a positive and careful approach in resolving the problems. She patiently listens to the problems and provides the best possible ways of treatment. She personally helped us to plan for hospitalization and c-section. She guided us very well after surgery. Finally I blessed with a baby boy and Thankyou so much to chandana ma'am for this beautiful pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After first delivery, I had multiple miscarriages and loads of health issues and more than those I had several fears, doubts and we were looking for some one who could guide us right. We consulted Doctor Chandana and in the first visit, we had our fears, doubts addressed so very well that we got hope back, no false assumptions given. This helped us to accept and plan ahead. I conceived and we were happy but still had those fears around. Doctor has ensured that all the concerns are addressed at any point of time in day, helped us understand the phase and be positive through out. Her passion, compassion, knowledge, understanding nature helps the person in pain to forgo, and plan ahead. We were blessed with a healthy baby girl on 18th Feb'23. Can't thank enough God and Doctor Chandana for being there with us through out the phase.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am extremely grateful to Dr Chandana ma’am for making my pregnancy journey a smooth One. Though there were certain ups and downs during the pregnancy period but ma’am always had a positive and careful approach in resolving the problems. She always motivated me to stay positive in those situations. She makes sure that the patients feel comfortable and happy. She patiently listens to the problems and provides the best possible ways of treatment. She is always approachable, humble and ready to clear all our queries. She gguideduided us very well after surgery. She personally helped us to plan the hospitalization. Also, she prescribed all the medicines beforehand which reduces the risks. I thank God that I met her and I am enjoying my motherhood with my twin babies .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: As a nonlocal and new in this state, it is difficult for anyone who did not know where we should get our treatment with good services, finally, we got the reference of Dr. Chandana madam. From the first day, during each visit, she shows more cooperation and solidarity. Thank you to Dr. Chandana for taking the time to review the diagnosis clearly and fully explain the examination procedure. Additionally, for any questions and concerns, available on WhatsApp (for any feedback report) as well as on emergency calls whenever necessary. She's very particular about the test results and the guidelines very well. Recommending her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: I am writing this long pending review of our pregnancy journey experience with doctor Chandana. I have started visiting her since my second trimester and since then we are so grateful to her for the support she has given us throughout my pregnancy. The way she talks and treated me pre and post delivery is commendable. She never rushed during consultations and spent lot of time with us answering all of our questions . Mine is a high risk pregnancy and every milestone was critical.Dr Chandana is so talented ,down to earth and friendly.she clearly explained all complications that might arise during delivery and made us aware of what to expect upfront and planned for my c section carefully. She was always reachable to us anytime.me and my family are so thankful to you Doctor Chandana.

tags: Wait time,
review:
Dr. Chandana provided us much needed handholding throughout our pregnancy journey. She has been extremely helpful, friendly and patient. She went above and beyond in providing suggestions/ guidance as and when needed and was generous enough to share her personal number. If you have been through the journey you will understand that pregnancy is no cakewalk and it needs support beyond regular visits and appointments. We got that support from Dr. Chandana. 
She takes time to explain the problem/ medical scenario in detail along with the options available and implications. Very few doctors put in the time and effort to do this with every patient.
My labor was longer than usual and she was constantly there for us during the process making the right and timely decisions for us along the way. 
In conclusion, we strongly recommend Dr. Chandana and very thankful to her for being our pregnancy companion.

A through professional, empathetic, cool and level headed doctor. She is very friendly and available for your queries and concerns at any time. She has made me feel comfortable every time I have visited.

review: I had difficulties during my first pregnancy. I was advised to undergo a procedure called encerclage(if done should be in strict bed rest until delivery, and delivery got to be only a Caeserian section), in view of short cervix during 3rd month of my pregnancy. Failing which I was cautioned about chances of abortion. It was when I consulted Dr.Chandana, who guided us rightly with confidence, avoided the encirclage procedure, made me have a normal delivery, inspite of prolonged struggle on the day of delivery. I strongly recommend Dr.Chandana for her expert guidance and treatment for all Obstrectics and Gynecological complaints. Her confidence and expert guidance with compassion to the patient will not disappoint you.

I was so skeptical to take medicine initially.  she explained each problem she motivated to reduce weight.  the medicine she gave worked like a miracle.  hardly 2 months i have taken medicine. tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I consulted Chandana ma'am for fibroid issue which was causing a lot of bleeding and pain. She was very caring and considerate throughout my treatment. Initially I was put on medicines but as the problem dint respond, I had to go for surgery (hysterectomy). I was very fearful of the operation but ma'am patiently answered all my doubts and I felt I was in safe hands. I finally underwent laproscopy surgery for removal of womb and everything went smoothly. Ma'am guided me in every step and I recovered very fast. I am quite satisfied with her treatment and care. I thank her from the bottom of my heart for everything and I highly recommend her.
reply_text: Appreciate your feedback very much and we are glad that you made a very fast recovery. It was your positive attitude that helped you all along. Wishing you good health!

review:
During mid of my pregnancy, i was diagnosed with Placenta Pervia. Dr. Chandana had advised me what to do and what not to do. She was always ready to answer the calls and to clear the doubts and queries during the entire tenure of my pregnancy.

During 33rd week of pregnancy, i was rushed to the hospital and underwent emergency C-section by Dr. Chandana and team. I was put up in ICU and it was due to the experience and knowledge of the Doctor, I recovered soon. We are a happy family now.

Myself and family are really thankful to Dr. Chandana.
reply_text: You are welcome. We are glad to help you anytime. Thanks for sharing your experience.
